channel.title: How do i add custom NPC's?
channel.description:
I am trying to add the corporeal beast. i typed add models in game and add model (#) I dunno what to do now though
Could someone explain it to me please :D? ty

item.title: How do i add custom NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @_Joshua1 |Joshua|
item.description:
@_Joshua1 wrote:

Compile the client turn on the server and spawn NPC 14701 if it the Corporeal Beast you did it right if not retrace your steps.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add custom NPC's?
item.dc:creator: @h3llk03r h3llk03r
item.description:
@h3llk03r wrote:

Alright this is what i put into class5.java:

if(i == 14701) {
aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630];
class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60);
class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
class5.aStringArray66[1] = “Attack”;
class5.anIntArray94 = new int[1];
int changedColors = 1;
class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors];
class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors];
class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61;
class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926;
class5.anIntArray94[0] = 1500 ;
class5.aString65 = “Corporeal Beast”;
class5.anInt61 = 7;
class5.aByteArray89 = “It eats souls.”.getBytes();
}

Thats all i did besides “add models and add model 14701”
